Hi there, I'm Rebecca.

I bring designs to life through code.

Before I moved into Application Development, I never quite found a perfect fit. I have done Digital Marketing, Graphic Design, Search Engine Optimization, Content Marketing and even IT Project Management. I was performing in my jobs, yet it wasn't quite enough. I then fell in love with building my mini aesthetic world with the power of code. I knew I had to follow my passion for design and programming when I don't mind doing this for fun even out of work.
I’m currently working for Accenture Interactive Delivery as a Full Stack Developer, with a specialization in Frontend Development.

Designer

I'm a user-centric designer. I believe that User Interface is meant to be intuitive. I like to think of it as a joke; If you have to explain it, it's probably not that good.

I love to design:

Web/Mobile Applications, UI Central Design System, Brand Identity, Graphic Design & User Journey

Softwares I use:

Adobe Illustrator
Adobe Indesign
Adobe Photoshop
AdobeXD
Figma
Invision
Sketch
Zeplin

Developer

I'm passionate about building software. I enjoy using my eye for design, my unequivocal love for building things, and my mission-driven work ethic to literally change the world.

Skills:

Java, JavaScript, MuleSoft, NodeJS, Python,
Jquery, HTML, CSS, Less, Sass

Frameworks & Libraries:

Angular, Ant Mobile Design, Bootstrap, Material UI, React, React Native, VueJS

Database:

MongoDB, MySQL, PostgresQL

Cloud Technologies:

AWS API Gateway, AWS CodeCommit, AWS EC2, AWS Lambda Functions, AWS S3

What Others Say About Me

Rebecca played a key role in leading the design and delivery of key assets. As assets are built in parallel, she was able to clearly segregate her time to ensure that projects are delivered in a timely manner. She consistently devoted her time to upskill and improve herself. She also demonstrated effectve communication skills which enabled efficient collaboration.

StrongWork ethic Rose Up toChallenges
'CAN DO' attitude Delivers Results

Rebecca is a versatile, determined and energetic worker, with a 'can do' attitude that delivers results. In working with Rebecca, I found her able to leverage her computing background and business intuition, while staying grounded in practicality. She also has a welcome bias for action that enables her to join and become a valuable member of technology teams quickly

Despite being new to AEM, Rebecca has been able to analyze the given requirements and apply what she has learnt and contribute to the project by building scalable components with minimal supervision. Rebecca has proved herself to be able to work independently as a developer.

BuildScalableComponents MinimalSupervision
Triple-hatted back-end developer, front-end developer and a UI designer

I was thoroughly impressed with what Rebecca brought to the table on a technical front. Her work was not only well thought out, but they consistently met the high quality demanded by our project managers. Rebecca also never failed to brighten up the room with her cheerful disposition and was a joy to work with!

Rebecca has contributed significantly in the overall UI/UX design and front-end development of the product. She has been constantly engaging the back-end team to clarify the requirements and the design of the APIs. This has significantly reduce the gap between the front-end team and back-end team. Besides, she also actively providing constructive feedback to the product team that further improve the product itself from a developer standpoint.

Fast Learnerpicks up skills quickly Applyimmediately
Perfect Mix oftechnical, design, process and scope

Rebecca has extremely outstanding skills which are needed for a great FED. She has the perfect mix of technical, design, process and scope to ensure any requirement is communicated and implemented. Its very hard to find a FED with that technical talent and backend skills to accelerate FED deliverables. I was very impressed about how quick Rebecca grasped and took on a platform she never worked with before.
